
BFFFBBF 70, RRR 7
1000110   , 111

F000000   0 -  63 0000000 - 0111111
B000000  64 - 127 1000000 - 1111111

FF00000   0 -  31 0000000 - 0011111
FB00000  32 -  63 0100000 - 0111111

BFFFFFF  64 -  95 1000000 - 1011111
BBFFFFF  96 - 127 1100000 - 1111111

FFF0000   0 -  15 0000000 - 0001111
FFB0000  16 -  31 0010000 - 0011111

FBF0000  32 -  47 0100000 - 0101111
FBB0000  48 -  63 0110000 - 0111111

BFF0000  64 -  79 1000000 - 1001111
BFF0000  80 -  95 1010000 - 1011111

BBF0000  96 - 111 1100000 - 1101111
BBB0000 112 - 127 1110000 - 1111111

127 = BBBBBBB
  0 = FFFFFFF

BFFFFFF - BFBBBBB 64 -  95 1000000 - 1011111
BBFFFFF - BBBBBBB 96 - 127 1100000 - 1111111
